summary: I don’t thing Chris is a heavy smoker, I think he’s more of a social one. Considering he’s the one that told Sebastian that...
question: I don’t thing Chris is a heavy smoker, I think he’s more of a social one. Considering he’s the one that told Sebastian that smoking was not a good way to cope with things I doubt he smokes a lot. Regarding the picture with Tara and the J&Bey party, the first couple of pics don’t show anything and it appears that it’s just an optical illusion because of the dress the lady behind him was wearing. I doubt he would smoke close to other people specially considering how close his hand was Tara’s dress
answer: Either way we know he smokes occasionally.. ;)

reblog.comment: Either way we know he smokes occasionally.. ;)

trail.content_raw: Either way we know he smokes occasionally.. ;)

summary: Ok but i just realised on that picture during Beyonce's party that Chris is attending woth Tara that he is smoking. And i was...
question: Ok but i just realised on that picture during Beyonce's party that Chris is attending woth Tara that he is smoking. And i was like nah he is not smoking BUT THEN i looked up pics of him smoking and it’s true and OMG!!!!  I just have a lof of feelings rn and I can’t!!! I’m in deep
answer: I don’t know if Chris is a heavy smoker or a social one but yeah I’ve known that for a while…I’m not a big fan of men who smoke…I’ve dated a smoker and he was like a chimney, but I try to forget this fact about Chris…hahaha

summary: Can I please stop being in love with Chris Evans? A celeb crush would be fine but my 15-years-and-counting celeb crush has...
body: Can I please stop being in love with Chris Evans? A celeb crush would be fine but my 15-years-and-counting celeb crush has evolved into stronger emotions now and that is not ok. I can’t go on dates anymore without comparing them to him and NO ONE CAN COMPARE TO CHRIS.

summary:
Writing a one shot this weekend, so options are: 
A) Going to Disneyland with Chris as he talks a big game but is actually...
body:
Writing a one shot this weekend, so options are:

A) Going to Disneyland with Chris as he talks a big game but is actually terrified to go on the twist and loop rollercoasters

B) The day after Oscars 2019 where a lot of people complimented Chris (for his looks and chivalrous movements), including his ex…

Pick and reply / message me which one you’d prefer to read! Or feel free to give me a different prompt! Thanks 👍🏼

tags: original: how i met your mother
summary:
[Steve and Bucky are always quarreling about who will be Tony]
Bucky: Tony Barnes! 
Steve: Tony Rogers! 
Bucky: Tony Barnes!...
body:
[Steve and Bucky are always quarreling about who will be Tony]

Bucky: Tony Barnes!

Steve: Tony Rogers!

Bucky: Tony Barnes!

Steve: Steve Stark! I’ll take his name. I don’t care.

Bucky: Okay. Wait. How about this? How about this? We share him. I’ll take him until he’s 80, and then you can have him after that.

Steve Okay, who are we kidding? He’s with Strange now. We just have to accept that, and move on.

blog.name: thegetawaywriter
blog.title: The Getaway Writer
blog.description: Masterlist Fic Recs Asks are open / Requests are closed This is a fanfic blog, I decided to share my writing.

title: Long hard week
body:
Pairing: Chris Evans x Reader

Warning: fluff

Request: Can I request a Chris Evans where he surprises his girlfriend or wife is having a bad week at work and he plans a romantic evening?

A/Y: This was supposed to come out later tonight, but I have things to do, so I’m gonna be off tumblr. Anon, I hope you like this, I know it took me a week but I feel like this should be published on a Friday. You want to read more of my writing? My masterlist is in my bio.

The week has been crazy, it was Monday and you already wanted to end, the only good thing today was you face time with Chris.

“Hey!”, he was clearly enthusiastic.

“Hey.”

“It looks like you had a bad day.”

“I did! But I don’t wanna talk about it.”

“You sure?”

“Everything went wrong, the meeting got cancelled, we lost a client.”, you sighed tired.

“I’m sorry.”

“Me too. How was your day?”

“We filmed some normal scenes today, so nothing mentally exhausted.”

You smiled, he was trying to make you laugh. “At least one of us had a good day today.”

“Is that chinese food?”, he asked when he saw the red box next to your coffe table.

“Maybe…”

“Come on, Y/n, it’s Monday.”

“I had a shitty day, I just needed some comfort, since you weren’t here, Chinese food seems to do the trick.”, you shrugged your shoulders.

You heard someone call for him.

“Babe, I got get back to work. Take care, call me if you need anything.”

“You too.”, you closed the notebook.


The week went horrible, it seems everything that could happen did. Meetings canceled, computers dying, the glass of your wristwatch brooke. You were so happy it was Friday, you cancelled the face timing with Chris, you just wanted to lay on the couch, close your eyes while some soft music played on the background. You weren’t living together yet, but you had his key and he insisted you stayed at his house to lay low. His street wasn’t noisy as yours, you usually declined his invitation, but this time you didn’t.

You just didn’t wanted to seem like you were taking advantage of his house, it was too big for you, but it had a pool, glass windows, it would be like a weekend getaway. When you opened the door, you smelled your favorite food, you were confused, Chris was working, no, it couldn’t be.

“Chris?”

“Y/n? I’m coming.”, he said from the kitchen.

“Hey…I thought you were working.”, you hugged him.

“They didn’t need me this weekend and it seemed like you did.”, he was letting go of your hug.

“Not yet.”, you held him tight.

“Is everything ok?”, he put both of his hands on each side of your face.

“It will now.”, you got closer to him, so you could kiss.

“I’ve made you dinner, it should be ready in 20 minutes or so, do you wanna take a shower first?”

“Yeah, I do.”, you put your arm around him and you both went to his room.

He placed your bag on the bed “Make yourself at home, Y/n.”, he kissed you and went back to the kitchen.

If the week wasn’t bad enough, now your body was sore. You were so anxious about work last night, you couldn’t sleep, so you decided to clean your apartment, do the laundry and iron some clothes, now the back of your upper legs were killing you, you were regretting it.

“Y/n? Are you gonna take long? Dinner is ready.”, he asked from his room.

“I’m just gonna put my clothes on. You decided to put one of his boxers and one of his shirts.”

“My clothes, huh? That bad?”, he said putting the food on the plates.

You gave him a peck on the lips, “Yeah, that bad.”, before grabbing your plate. As you sat on the chair, you cursed, your legs felt so heavy and they were hurting so bad.

“What was that?”

“Nothing, I just might have overloaded myself yesterday.”

“You didn’t went all crazy eyes and decided to clean the house, and wash the clothes in the same day, did you?”

You took a sip of your drink, “Look, I couldn’t sleep I would have to do the same way.”

He shooke his head.

In the middle of the dinner you thanked him.

“For what?”

“This, you didn’t have to.”

“You are always talking care of me and you worry way too much, you deserve to relax.”

You help him with the dishes, even when he insisted you should rest. You both sat on the couch, you were sitting between his legs, with your head on his chest. He started massaging your shoulders, when he realized how tense you were. “Y/n, lay for me.”

“Why?”, you looked at him confused.

“No…”, he chuckled, “it’s not that, just lay down on your stomach.”

You did as he told you. “Now where does it hurt?”, he looked at your legs.

“Here.”, you showed him.

He took you answer as a invitation, he started to massage your leg.

“Right there, it feels so good.”, he was doing all the moves you wanted him to do, he didn’t need guidance, the more you moaned, the more he was sure he was doing the right thing.

He was silent, but you know he was smirking. “Babe?”

“Huh?”

“You are really turned on right now, aren’t you?”

“Ok, I’m done.”

“Why?”, you stood up on your elbows.

“You now why, all these moning. I think the massage will make it better.”

“Let’s go outside and watch the lights.”, you said to him.

“Sure.”, he grabbed your hand, you two head outside where you could see the skyline of LA.

“I don’t know what you see in those lights, the Downton LA lights at night.”, he said curiously.

“I don’t know, it kind of reminds me of New York and that this city is not as shallow as people think it is.”

“You probably the only person who likes this city.”

“Oh no, they have lots of events, concerts, all that how I’m not supposed to like? I hate the traffic and the dry weather though.”, you both chuckled.

“Chris?”

“Y/n?”, he was now facing you.

“I don’t want you to think I’m taking advantage of all this.”

“What do you mean?”

“I mean this house, you having a comfortable financial situation, these parties where I meet all these amazing movie people.”

“Where is this coming from? I could never think that, you were always the one who wanted to kept it private.”, he cupped your cheeks.

“I just heard some things and I just wanna make sure you knew that.”

“Of course, I do.”

“Good!”, you pulled him closer to you. “Cause I love you, and my answer is yes, I want to move in with you.”

“You do?”

“Yeah.”

You kissed him, and he grabbed the back of your legs signaling for you to wrapped around him. He would later find out LA could feel more like home than he ever thought it was hummanly possible.

Taglist: @sgtevanstan @patzammit @allithewriter @fandomwritingsgalore @mackevanstanfan80 @whiskey-cokenfanfic @petitemistletoes @twentysomethingloser92 @chonisberonica @unhealthyobsessionwithmarvel @unapologeticallymimi @siren-queen03 @cevansgirl @jbug491@coffeebooksandfandom

If you want be add or remove from the taglist, let me know.

Gifs are not mine.

“I mean this house, you having a comfortable financial situation, these parties where I meet all these amazing movie people.”

“Where is this coming from? I could never think that, you were always the one who wanted to kept it private.”, he cupped your cheeks.

“I just heard some things and I just wanna make sure you knew that.”

“Of course, I do.”

“Good!”, you pulled him closer to you. “Cause I love you, and my answer is yes, I want to move in with you.”

“You do?”

“Yeah.”

You kissed him, and he grabbed the back of your legs signaling for you to wrapped around him. He would later find out LA could feel more like home than he ever thought it was hummanly possible.

trail.content_raw:
Pairing: Chris Evans x Reader

Warning: fluff

Request: Can I request a Chris Evans where he surprises his girlfriend or wife is having a bad week at work and he plans a romantic evening?

A/Y: This was supposed to come out later tonight, but I have things to do, so I’m gonna be off tumblr. Anon, I hope you like this, I know it took me a week but I feel like this should be published on a Friday. You want to read more of my writing? My masterlist is in my bio.

The week has been crazy, it was Monday and you already wanted to end, the only good thing today was you face time with Chris.

“Hey!”, he was clearly enthusiastic.

“Hey.”

[[MORE]]

“It looks like you had a bad day.”

“I did! But I don’t wanna talk about it.”

“You sure?”

“Everything went wrong, the meeting got cancelled, we lost a client.”, you sighed tired.

“I’m sorry.”

“Me too. How was your day?”

“We filmed some normal scenes today, so nothing mentally exhausted.”

You smiled, he was trying to make you laugh. “At least one of us had a good day today.”

“Is that chinese food?”, he asked when he saw the red box next to your coffe table.

“Maybe…”

“Come on, Y/n, it’s Monday.”

“I had a shitty day, I just needed some comfort, since you weren’t here, Chinese food seems to do the trick.”, you shrugged your shoulders.

You heard someone call for him.

“Babe, I got get back to work. Take care, call me if you need anything.”

“You too.”, you closed the notebook.


The week went horrible, it seems everything that could happen did. Meetings canceled, computers dying, the glass of your wristwatch brooke. You were so happy it was Friday, you cancelled the face timing with Chris, you just wanted to lay on the couch, close your eyes while some soft music played on the background. You weren’t living together yet, but you had his key and he insisted you stayed at his house to lay low. His street wasn’t noisy as yours, you usually declined his invitation, but this time you didn’t.

You just didn’t wanted to seem like you were taking advantage of his house, it was too big for you, but it had a pool, glass windows, it would be like a weekend getaway. When you opened the door, you smelled your favorite food, you were confused, Chris was working, no, it couldn’t be.

“Chris?”

“Y/n? I’m coming.”, he said from the kitchen.

“Hey…I thought you were working.”, you hugged him.

“They didn’t need me this weekend and it seemed like you did.”, he was letting go of your hug.

“Not yet.”, you held him tight.

“Is everything ok?”, he put both of his hands on each side of your face.

“It will now.”, you got closer to him, so you could kiss.

“I’ve made you dinner, it should be ready in 20 minutes or so, do you wanna take a shower first?”

“Yeah, I do.”, you put your arm around him and you both went to his room.

He placed your bag on the bed “Make yourself at home, Y/n.”, he kissed you and went back to the kitchen.

If the week wasn’t bad enough, now your body was sore. You were so anxious about work last night, you couldn’t sleep, so you decided to clean your apartment, do the laundry and iron some clothes, now the back of your upper legs were killing you, you were regretting it.

“Y/n? Are you gonna take long? Dinner is ready.”, he asked from his room.

“I’m just gonna put my clothes on. You decided to put one of his boxers and one of his shirts.”

“My clothes, huh? That bad?”, he said putting the food on the plates.

You gave him a peck on the lips, “Yeah, that bad.”, before grabbing your plate. As you sat on the chair, you cursed, your legs felt so heavy and they were hurting so bad.

“What was that?”

“Nothing, I just might have overloaded myself yesterday.”

“You didn’t went all crazy eyes and decided to clean the house, and wash the clothes in the same day, did you?”

You took a sip of your drink, “Look, I couldn’t sleep I would have to do the same way.”

He shooke his head.

In the middle of the dinner you thanked him.

“For what?”

“This, you didn’t have to.”

“You are always talking care of me and you worry way too much, you deserve to relax.”

You help him with the dishes, even when he insisted you should rest. You both sat on the couch, you were sitting between his legs, with your head on his chest. He started massaging your shoulders, when he realized how tense you were. “Y/n, lay for me.”

“Why?”, you looked at him confused.

“No…”, he chuckled, “it’s not that, just lay down on your stomach.”

You did as he told you. “Now where does it hurt?”, he looked at your legs.

“Here.”, you showed him.

He took you answer as a invitation, he started to massage your leg.

“Right there, it feels so good.”, he was doing all the moves you wanted him to do, he didn’t need guidance, the more you moaned, the more he was sure he was doing the right thing.

He was silent, but you know he was smirking. “Babe?”

“Huh?”

“You are really turned on right now, aren’t you?”

“Ok, I’m done.”

“Why?”, you stood up on your elbows.

“You now why, all these moning. I think the massage will make it better.”

“Let’s go outside and watch the lights.”, you said to him.

“Sure.”, he grabbed your hand, you two head outside where you could see the skyline of LA.

“I don’t know what you see in those lights, the Downton LA lights at night.”, he said curiously.

“I don’t know, it kind of reminds me of New York and that this city is not as shallow as people think it is.”

“You probably the only person who likes this city.”

“Oh no, they have lots of events, concerts, all that how I’m not supposed to like? I hate the traffic and the dry weather though.”, you both chuckled.

“Chris?”

“Y/n?”, he was now facing you.

“I don’t want you to think I’m taking advantage of all this.”

“What do you mean?”

“I mean this house, you having a comfortable financial situation, these parties where I meet all these amazing movie people.”

“Where is this coming from? I could never think that, you were always the one who wanted to kept it private.”, he cupped your cheeks.

“I just heard some things and I just wanna make sure you knew that.”

“Of course, I do.”

“Good!”, you pulled him closer to you. “Cause I love you, and my answer is yes, I want to move in with you.”

“You do?”

“Yeah.”

You kissed him, and he grabbed the back of your legs signaling for you to wrapped around him. He would later find out LA could feel more like home than he ever thought it was hummanly possible.

Taglist: @sgtevanstan @patzammit @allithewriter @fandomwritingsgalore @mackevanstanfan80 @whiskey-cokenfanfic @petitemistletoes @twentysomethingloser92 @chonisberonica @unhealthyobsessionwithmarvel @unapologeticallymimi @siren-queen03 @cevansgirl @jbug491@coffeebooksandfandom

If you want be add or remove from the taglist, let me know.

Gifs are not mine.
